text:
🏷️ 隨時以低至6折追加數據 ( [redacted_url])
溫馨提示💕：出發前喺SoSIM App將外遊數據設為「自動啟用」，到埗後開啟數據漫遊及VoLTE功能，並確定Wi-Fi已關閉就用得！
💬📞連接當地網絡即可免費接收短訊 (使用4G/5G網絡時須開啟VoLTE功能)。 有餘額唔使買Package都打到電話^，遇到緊急情況可隨時使用！ 想打電話返香港？ 記得喺電話號碼前加「+852」～
trans:
🏷️ Add extra data anytime with up to 40% off ([redacted_url])
Helpful Tip💕: Before your trip, enable “Automatic Activation” for roaming data in the SoSIM App. Once you arrive, turn on data roaming and VoLTE, and ensure Wi-Fi is off to use it seamlessly!
💬📞 Connect to the local network to receive SMS for free (VoLTE must be enabled when using 4G/5G networks). You can make calls without purchasing a Package if you have remaining credit^. In case of emergencies, you can use it anytime! Want to call Hong Kong? Don’t forget to add "+852" before the phone number!
